name: The Resistance (itch) (tonydestroyerofworlds)
description:
The Resistance is an interactive text based survival game created in Twine.  How you choose to play the game is up to you.  But remember, choices have consequences, choose wisely.

150 years have passed since hostile alien forces have invaded the planet. Humanity is scattered. Most are under the subjugation of the alien occupation, but intermittent patches of humanity fight against the occupation. The few humans that fight are known as The Resistance.
